services.name: Afsar Uddin
services.bio: Afsar Uddin is a renowned Bangladeshi chef who has over 20 years of experience in the culinary industry. He is known for his unique take on traditional Bangladeshi dishes, incorporating modern techniques and flavors to create new and exciting dishes.

recipes.cooking_method: 1. Cook the rice and set aside. 2. In a separate pan, cook the chicken with onions, ginger-garlic paste, and spices. 3. Layer the chicken and rice in a large pot and cook over low heat until the flavors meld together.
1. Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Coat the chicken in flour and deep fry until crispy. 3. Serve hot with your favorite sauce.
1. Cook onions, ginger-garlic paste, and spices in a pan. 2. Add the fish and cook until it starts to flake. 3. Add tomato puree and coconut milk and simmer for a few minutes.

services.name: Nahida Akter
services.bio: Nahida Akter is a talented Bangladeshi chef who specializes in creating delicious and healthy dishes. She has a passion for using fresh, locally sourced ingredients to create meals that are both nutritious and flavorful.

services.name: Kamal Ahmed
services.bio: Kamal Ahmed is a highly skilled Bangladeshi chef who has worked in some of the most prestigious restaurants in the world. He is known for his attention to detail and his ability to create dishes that are both beautiful and delicious.
